review: Great device, has all the features I was looking for.
author: Henry Lemonjello

review: I LOVEEEEEE the Fire TV Stick... although i haven't used it much. i do LOVE IT. my only issue with it is that there is no way to turn it off. i believe there is a way to set it so sleep, i think that's what's called sleep. but there is no way to turn it OFF completely. also it would be even BETTERRRRRR, if the GOLDEN GIRLS were free of charge :-) :-) and part of the Amazon Prime selection... :-) but i do LOVEEEEEEEEEE the Fire TV Stick... THANKS AMAZON another EXCELLENT PRODUCT/SERVICE... ®
author: Wilson Ramos

review: There's a lag and a delay.  We thought it was our internet. We had our internet provider come out to check our line and even upgraded the to the fasted top speed.  For some reason it still lags and is slow to change through each app.
author: VANESSA

review: So simple to use and the cost is fair.  I highly recommend this.

review: Awesome. I'm loving all the shows and movies that come with Prime!

review: This small device packs a punch. It is fast , versatile, easy to setup. Amazon does a good job delivering updates promptly and often.
author: Yamil Cabrera
